QuestData.Title: Friends Come In All Colors
QuestData.Description: My brothers and I are being hunted.$B$BOur sire was recently killed and the black dragonflight seeks to rout those of us that still live. I'm here to find Azuregos and take him to safety, if only he would let it be that easy.$B$BAzuregos doesn't make many friends, and his taste in them tends to be a bit... unique. The only one I know of here is a murloc named Ergll. You should be able to find him on the coast northeast of here.$B$BDo whatever it takes to find Azuregos and send him to me.$B$BPlease hurry.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Ergll on the coast of the Ruins of Arkkoran.
QuestData.RewardText: Hello there! A new friend! So glad to meet you. My name is Ergll. The g is silent.
